container.garbagebins.filter.label: Filter
container.garbagebins.settings.title: Settings
container.garbagebins.redstone.title: Redstone Control
container.garbagebins.redstone.desc: Changes how the bin reacts to redstone signal. "Normal" uses same logic as the Hopper.
container.garbagebins.filter.title: Filter
container.garbagebins.filter.desc: Changes the filter behavior. "Whitelist" means that you can only insert items that match the items in the filter.
